spec_data.Name: exiv2-libs
spec_data.Description:
A C++ library to access image metadata, supporting full read and write access
to the Exif and Iptc metadata, Exif MakerNote support, extract and delete
methods for Exif thumbnails, classes to access Ifd and so on.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 12:03:56 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Exif and Iptc metadata manipulation library
